Package MyContainers

Class MyHeap<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • MyContainers.MyHeap<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - elements of heap
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<MyHeap<E>>
    public class MyHeap<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<MyHeap<E>>
    Heap implementation using Priority Queue as Data field and delegate methods.
